title: Beautiful brown eyes
creator_credit: David Facey, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When David Facey’s daughter was born the first thing he fell in love with was her beautiful brown eyes. Ironically, it was those same eyes that told him something wasn’t quite right.
